strings.Value: "My blood still boils when I remember what Tristian did at Vordakai's tomb! But still... the suffering on his face was so deep, so sincere..."
"That's for sure! I don't know what to think! On the one hand, I want so badly just to swat him on the head... On the other hand â€” what if he had a good reason for doing what he did?"
"Don't deceive yourself. He who betrays once will betray again."
"He's the only thing we ever talk about lately! Maybe he just needed more attention, ha ha ha hmm?"
"Let me get this straight: you're talking about his spiritual suffering, right? I find it hard to feel compassion for someone whose brothers in faith so much enjoy the torment of others."
"Let me get this straight: you're talking about his spiritual suffering, right? I find it hard to feel compassion for someone whose brothers in faith so much enjoy the torment of others."
